snippet.title: Go Go Nippon Gameplay Video
snippet.description: This is a video of how Go Go Nippon looks during gameplay. You can purchase the game from our website at http://www.mangagamer.com and vote for it on Steam Greenlight too: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=93045793 !
